text: UNICEF Photo of the Year is an award given to photos and short documentary movies which show the "personality and living conditions of children around the world". The award is given to professional photographers, who have been preselected and recommended to UNICEF by a jury. The head of the jury (as of 2023), is Rolf Nobel, a German photographer.o. V.: UNICEF-Foto des Jahres, Informationen und Bildergalerie auf der Seite unicef.de, zuletzt abgerufen am 3. September 2017 Every two years, Photokina in Cologne shows a selection of the best pictures of the preceding two years. == References == Category:Photography
title: UNICEF photo of the year
